title: Manages patRoon Installations
text: patRoonInst package specifically used automate simplify installations patRoon. Please refer patRoon installation section handbook, reference documentation details.

title: Manages patRoon Installations
text: latest version can installed r-universe directly GitHub:
code: # installation from r-universe install.packages("patRoonInst", repos = c('https://rickhelmus.r-universe.dev', 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # or alternatively, from GitHub install.packages("remotes") # run this if the remotes (or devtools) package is not yet installed. remotes::install_github("rickhelmus/patRoonInst")

title: Managing patRoon installations — installing
text: Functions install, update synchronize patRoon dependencies various repositories.

title: Managing patRoon installations — installing
code: install(   origin = NULL,   pkgs = NULL,   ignorePkgs = NULL,   lib.loc = NULL,   ask = TRUE,   force = FALSE,   quiet = TRUE )  update(   origin = NULL,   pkgs = NULL,   ignorePkgs = NULL,   lib.loc = NULL,   ask = TRUE,   quiet = TRUE )  sync(   origin = NULL,   pkgs = NULL,   ignorePkgs = NULL,   lib.loc = NULL,   allDeps = FALSE,   ask = TRUE,   quiet = TRUE )

title: Managing patRoon installations — installing
text: origin patRoon R dependencies installed . Valid values : "patRoonDeps", "runiverse", "regular". NULL default Windows "patRoonDeps" "runiverse" otherwise. See details. pkgs, ignorePkgs character vector packages consider/ignore. Execute names(getDirectDeps()) obtain valid package options. NULL packages considered/none ignored. ignorePkgs argument can also include "big" exclude large packages (e.g. patRoonDeps), override pkgs case conflicts. lib.loc path R library packages installed. Set NULL default R library. ask Set TRUE ask proceeding package installations. effect non-interactive R sessions. force TRUE packages always installed, even already present correct version. quiet TRUE installations performed quietly (sets quiet option install.packages(). allDeps Consider dependencies synchronizing, including recursive dependencies. currently supported origin="patRoonDeps". Note handling recursive dependencies currently influenced pkgs ignorePkgs arguments.

title: Managing patRoon installations — installing
text: installation patRoon involves installing several dependencies, including R packages available common repositories (CRAN, BioConductor) software outside R environment. following three functions automate process used install maintain patRoon dependencies: install() Installs patRoon missing dependencies. update() Like install() updates outdated packages. sync() Like update() may also downgrade packages fully synchronize package versions repository. R packages currently sourced following repositories (set origin argument): "patRoonDeps": specialized miniCRAN repository contains binary R packages versions automatically tested patRoon. Currently supported Windows. "runiverse": r-universe repository containing latest versions patRoon dependencies. "regular": last versions sourced regular CRAN/BioConductor repositories GitHub. latter means suitable build tools (e.g. Rtools windows). Note large R packages, currently patRoonDeps, patRoonExt MetaCleanData, always sourced directly GitHub. Synchronization sync() mainly designed used combination patRoonDeps repository, since contains package versions already tested patRoon. synchronization commonly used patRoon bundle installations patRoon installed separate R library (.e. using lib.loc argument). Furthermore, allDeps argument set TRUE ensure dependencies synchronized. Packages originate GitHub (even obtained via patRoonDeps/runiverse) also synchronized update(), since packages typically involve 'snapshots' unreliable version information.

title: Manage legacy patRoon installations — legacy
text: Toggles removes installations patRoon installed legacy installation script (install_patRoon.R).

title: Manage legacy patRoon installations — legacy
text: enable Enables (enable=TRUE), disables (enable=FALSE) toggles (enable=NULL) legacy patRoon installation. restoreRProfile TRUE modifications user's .Rprofile file removed automatically performed legacy installation script.

title: Manage legacy patRoon installations — legacy
text: Previous versions patRoon (<2.3) installed via (now legacy) installation R script (install_patRoon.R). functions documented can (temporarily) undo changes script, installation functions package can used manage patRoon installations. toggleLegacy() function used enable disable legacy installations temporarily. removeLegacy() function used undo legacy installations.

title: Manage legacy patRoon installations — legacy
text: R session restarted make changes effective.

title: Manage legacy patRoon installations — legacy
text: section purely informative, may use want manually manage legacy installations. legacy installation script typically results following changes: ~/patRoon-install: directory external dependencies (MetFrag, SIRIUS, ...) may contain R packages patRoonDeps repository depending user input installation. ~/.Rprofile-patRoon.R: R script loaded R startup, initializes configuration needed use files (1). Code ~/.Rprofile actually load (2) R startup (exists) toggleLegacy() used disable legacy installations function simply renames initialization script (2) loaded R startup. removeLegacy() function removes files (1-2) optionally changes (3).

title: Manage patRoon installations — patRoonInst-package
text: following package options (see options()) can set: patRoonInst.repos.patRoonDeps URL patRoonDeps R package repository. patRoonInst.repos.runiverse URL r-universe R package repository. patRoonInst.path.legacy directory legacy files installed.
